title: Frank Zappa - Road Tapes #1 (2012) 2CD (Vancouver, 1968)
description:
â€œRoad Tapes, Venue #1â€ (2012), recorded in August 1968 at Vancouverâ€™s Kerrisdale Arena, captures the wry Frank Zappa and his freewheeling Mothers of Invention as they "make an earnest attempt to rock out at the local electric ice box" 
- and succeed handily by effortlessly blending rock, avant-garde, doo-wop and more into a typically freewheeling and unhinged 88-minute set. 
Great show.


Frank Zappa & The Mothers of Invention

(Kerrisdale Arena, Vancouver B.C., August 25, 1968)
